body_html:
If you use docker on Windows or OS X, you have to specify the memory the Linux virtual machine will use in advance and the default (at least at the time) is too low for tensorflow.

body:
If you use docker on Windows or OS X, you have to specify the memory the
Linux virtual machine will use in advance and the default (at least at the
time) is too low for tensorflow.
On Fri, Apr 28, 2017 at 4:59 PM Skye Wanderman-Milne <
notifications@github.com> wrote:
